title: Thalavali Lyrics
stanzas:
kedi lady thallipodi
neethan ennoda thalavali
mental aagi ponen naane
adichathu ellaame eranguthadi

ah kaanja karuvaadaa en lifea
maathivittaa
adi kanna moodiyum thoonga vidaama
kaadha pothavittaa

enna inga vandhu niruthi
en nenja thinna oruthi
ava sonna vaartha ellaam nambi
naanum nadu roatil ninnen

thinam thinam un thollai
enaku ini than illa
kedi neethaan en thalavali
enakkuthaan ulla feelinglaam illa
tata bye bye di thalavali
thalavali, thalavali, thalavali
thalavali thalavali

ye lifey beautiful thaane
cutea kutti kutti moments thaane
fresha nitham oru duetu thaane
aana unmaiyila ellaam poithaane

en buthiku eralaye
en manasu ketkalaiye
ye poadi nee venaandi
ellaam en thalavithi

thinam thinam un thollai
enaku ini than illa
kedi neethaan en thalavali
enakkuthaan ulla feelinglaam illa
tata bye bye di thalavali
thalavali

loveula everyday problemthaane
neeyum ottumotham wasteu thaane
unnaala enakku mattum tensionthaane
unvazhaka oru thalavalithaane

nee en thalavali ayyo en thalavali
ellaam en thalavidhi
ellaam en thalavidhi
tom n jerry a pola neeyum naanum
venaame nee enakku venaame

thinam thinam un thollai
enaku ini than illa
kedi neethaan en thalavali
enakkuthaan ulla feelinglaam illa
tata bye bye di thalavali
